articles.author: Zack Sharf
articles.title: Timothée Chalamet Calls Armie Hammer Allegations ‘Disorienting,’ Reveals Tom Cruise Sent Him an Email With Lists of Stunt Trainers: It Was a ‘War Cry’ - Variety
articles.description: Timothee Chalamet says Tom Cruise emailed him after "Dune" a list of stunt trainers, motorcycle coaches and more.
articles.content: In a lengthy new cover story for GQ magazine, Timothée Chalamet reveals that Tom Cruise sent him an email after they met following the production of “Dune” in which Cruise offered up a list of all th… [+3029 chars]
